data.comment: The match is underway in Mexico City.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 2, Leonardo Suarez (America) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez is booked for the away team.
Guadalajara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from America.
In the minute 6, America's Leonardo Suarez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guadalajara defender.
Nicolas Benedetti of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
America's Giovani Dos Santos misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 12, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards America a goal kick.
Alexis Vega gets his shot on target but fails to score for Guadalajara.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Guadalajara pushes forward through Alexis Vega, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, Free kick for America in the half of Guadalajara.
Jesus Molina (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in America territory.
In the minute 26, Henry Martin for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Goal! America have got their heads in front thanks to a Giovani Dos Santos strike.
In the minute 27, Richard Sanchez instrumental with a fine assist.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick America.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Throw-in America.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of America.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Mexico City.
America's Nicolas Benedetti breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
America have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 39, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 43, America's Giovani Dos Santos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
In the minute 45, Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
America needs to be cautious. Guadalajara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 49, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for America, close to Guadalajara's area.
In Mexico City, Leonardo Suarez of America is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for America in the half of Guadalajara.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 54, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in America's half.
America to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramon Juarez is on a sub for Emanuel Aguilera for America.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 56, America's Nicolas Benedetti has been booked in Mexico City.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
The away team replace Jesus Molina with Jose Vazquez.
The away team have replaced Cristian Calderon with Miguel Ponce. This is the third substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
In the minute 60, Eduardo Lopez is replacing Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
In Mexico City America attack through Sebastian Cordova. The finish is off target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of America.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 65, Miguel Ponce (Guadalajara) gets a yellow card.
At Estadio Azteca, Jorge Sanchez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
In the minute 69, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Antonio Lopez Amenabar is replacing Giovani Dos Santos for the home team.
Miguel Herrera (America) is making a third substitution, with Santiago Caseres replacing Nicolas Benedetti.
In the minute 71, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Miguel Ponce of Guadalajara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards America a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Azteca with Jesus Angulo replacing Dieter Villalpando.
In the minute 76, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guadalajara's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Isaac Brizuela for Guadalajara drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Throw-in America.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
America make their fourth substitution with Roger Martinez replacing Leonardo Suarez.
In the minute 82, Free kick in a good position for Guadalajara!
Guadalajara are coming forward and Eduardo Lopez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 84, Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
The away team have replaced Alexis Vega with Oribe Peralta. This is the fifth substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 85, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guadalajara drive upfield and Jose Macias gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a America defender.
Richard Sanchez (America) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alonso Escoboza is on a sub for Henry Martin for America.
In the minute 89, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Free kick America.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
America have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In Mexico City Guadalajara drive forward through Isaac Brizuela. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a America throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Azteca.
That's full-time at Estadio Azteca. The final score is 1-0.
Ramon Juarez (America) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
